body:
Hello @jreback! Thanks for updating this PR. We checked the lines you've touched for [PEP 8](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008) issues, and found:











































There are currently no PEP 8 issues detected in this Pull Request. Cheers! :beers: 

##### Comment last updated at 2019-04-05 02:34:13 UTC

so this could be simplfiied if we make pyarrow a hard dependency :-D, then we don't need the numpy compat layer.
